title: ISS partners seek to maximize use of station through 2030
summary: While the partners in the International Space Station have agreed to operate the station through at least the late 2020s, the extended use of the station still faces technical and budgetary challenges.

title: NASA SpaceX Crew 8 Announced
summary: NASA's SpaceX Crew-8's crew members have been selected! Crew 8 will embark on a long-duration stay aboard the International Space Station (ISS) in early 2024.

title: Space Station Assignments Out for NASA’s SpaceX Crew-8 Mission
summary: Four crew members now are assigned to launch on NASA’s SpaceX Crew-8 mission for a long-duration stay aboard the International Space Station.

title: House Armed Services Committee Chairman Launches Investigation Into President Biden's US Space Command HQ Decision
summary: In a move that has intensified the ongoing debate over the location of the U.S. Space Command's headquarters, Chairman of the House Armed Services Committee, Rep. Mike Rogers (R-Ala.), announced on August 3 that he is launching an investigation into the Biden administration's decision to keep the headquarters in Colorado.

title: SES Investigation Delays Next O3b mPower Mission
summary: Satellite operator SES has announced that it will conduct extra tests before proceeding with the launch of its next pair of O3b mPower satellites.
